channel.title: Different graphs from different dashboards gathered to one dashboard
channel.description: Is it possible to pick specific graphs from different dashboards and add it to a separate dashboard?

item.title: Different graphs from different dashboards gathered to one dashboard
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Not directly. The same visualisation can be used on many dashboards but it needs to be added individually to each.

Read full topic
item.source: Different graphs from different dashboards gathered to one dashboard
